title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Introducing the Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas from The Republic of Tea - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle! Indulge in the cozy flavors of the season with this delightful tea collection, packed with 36 count tea bags each.

The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally-caffeine free blend that will transport you to crisp autumn days. Immerse yourself in the comforting taste of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. Made with the finest ingredients including apple pieces, orange peel, and ginger root, this blend is perfect for those seeking a warm and soothing beverage without the caffeine.

For those with a sweet tooth, the Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend that will satisfy your dessert cravings. Enjoy the luscious combination of sweet apples, vanilla, and South African Rooibos. Crafted with premium ingredients like apple bits and natural apple and caramel flavors, this tea is the ultimate treat to indulge in.

To steep these teas to perfection, simply bring your water to a rolling boil and steep for 5-7 minutes in 6 oz of water. And here's a bonus - once you're done, you can add the used tea bags to your compost or soil for an eco-friendly touch.

With 36 count tea bags of each flavor, this bundle is the ideal accompaniment to the harvest season and a delightful dessert tea. Don't miss out on this limited-edition fall collection from The Republic of Tea. Grab yours today and savor the flavors of autumn!

Introducing The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each! 

Indulge in the delightful flavors of fall with our exclusive tea bundle. This bundle includes two delicious blends - Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea - packed with the essence of autumn. 

The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally-caffeine free blend that perfectly captures the flavors of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. Each sip will transport you to cozy evenings by the fireplace, surrounded by the comforting aroma of spiced apples. 

Our Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend that combines the sweetness of apples with hints of vanilla and a base of South African Rooibos. This exquisite blend is a treat for your taste buds, offering a luscious and indulgent tea experience.

With each bundle containing 36 tea bags, you can enjoy these delightful flavors throughout the season. Whether you're looking to accompany your harvest season or to satisfy your dessert cravings, this tea bundle is the perfect choice.

Preparing these teas is a breeze. Simply bring water to a rolling boil, steep the tea bags for 5-7 minutes in 6 oz of water, and savor the rich flavors that unfold with each sip. And here's an eco-friendly tip - after enjoying your tea, you can add the used tea bags to compost or soil, contributing to a sustainable lifestyle.

Don't miss out on this limited-edition fall tea bundle. Treat yourself or surprise someone special with the taste of autumn. Order your bundle of The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas today!

Introducing the Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle from The Republic of Tea! Indulge in the comforting flavors of autumn with this exquisite tea collection. Each bundle contains 36 count tea bags of both Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea, allowing you to savor the essence of fall.

The Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea is a naturally-caffeine free blend bursting with the flavors of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves. Made with a delightful combination of apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, and more, this tea will transport you to cozy evenings by the fireplace.

The Caramel Apple Herbal Tea is a caffeine-free blend that combines the sweetness of apples and the smoothness of vanilla with South African Rooibos. Crafted with high-quality ingredients like Rooibos, apple bits, natural apple and caramel flavors, and vanilla extract, this tea is a dessert-like indulgence without the guilt.

Steeping these delightful teas is a breeze! Simply bring your water to a rolling boil, add 6 oz of water to your tea bag, and steep for 5-7 minutes. And here's a bonus tip: after you've enjoyed your cup of tea, don't throw away the used tea bags! They can be added to compost or soil, making them eco-friendly.

This Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas bundle is the perfect accompaniment to the harvest season and a delightful treat for any tea lover. Whether you're enjoying a quiet moment alone or hosting a cozy gathering with loved ones, these teas will elevate the experience.
